field.label: HTML Block
To begin registration choose the number of participants:

field.content: Try a valid coupon code if discount is not applied

field.label: How did you hear about us?

choice.text: Sadhguru's daily message or message of the day.
YouTube Channel (featuring Sadhguru's talks, meditations, etc.)
Facebook (featuring quotes and articles of Sadhguru, Isha recipes, events, webinars, etc.)

field.label: Would you like to receive continuing education credits for this course?
2nd Would you like to receive continuing education credits for this course?
3rd Would you like to receive continuing education credits for this course?
4th Would you like to receive continuing education credits for this course?
5th Would you like to receive continuing education credits for this course?
6th Would you like to receive continuing education credits for this course?
7th Would you like to receive continuing education credits for this course?

field.content:
Terms & Conditions : 
  • One must attend all sessions. If a portion or any of the sessions is missed, your admission in to the class will be at the discretion of the organizers.
  • I am at least 14 years and above.
     
Cancellation / Refund Policy: 
  • USD 25 processing fee will be deducted for all cancellations on or before 1 week from program date.
  • 50% of the total program fee paid amount will be deducted for cancellation within one week of the program date.
  • 75% of the total program fee paid amount will be deducted for cancellation from the program date and there after.
  • Our class capacity is limited, thus if a cancellation is necessary, please inform us as early as possible so that we can offer this opportunity to someone on our waiting list. 
  • Refund processing time is 3-4 weeks.

Click here to read the complete agreement.
field.label: Terms

choice.text: I agree to the above terms and conditions

confirmation.name: Default Confirmation
confirmation.message:
You are successfully registered. Expect a confirmation email shortly for each registered participant.

If you did not receive a payment confirmation email, please check your spam folder or contact $center_email.
 
Regards,
Inner Engineering Registration Team
 
Click here to Continue

notification.name: General-SingleReg
notification.subject: Welcome to Inner Engineering 4-Day Program: $city, USA $from_to, 2016
notification.message:
Dear {name1 (First):40.3}, We look forward to having you at the upcoming Inner Engineering program. Please find information you’ll need below. Program Information : Program Name : 4 Day Inner Engineering program - $city, USA $from_to, 2016 Program Date : $from_to_with_ordinal, 2016 Thursday, $thursday, 2016 : Check-in $check_in, Class from $thursday_time Friday, $friday, 2016  : $friday_time Saturday, $saturday, 2016 : $saturday_time Sunday, $sunday, 2016: $sunday_time Venue : {location1:148} View on map Total Paid Amount: {Total:11} Payment Confirmation # : {txn_id} Participant Information {name1 (First):40.3} {name1 (Last):40.6} Gender : {gender1:121} Phone: {phone1:42}  Email: {email1:41} Address : {address1 (Street Address):43.1} {address1 (City):43.3}, {address1 (State / Province):43.4}, {address1 (ZIP / Postal Code):43.5}, {address1 (Country):43.6} For your convenience, you can email us if there are any changes to the above information. This will make your check-in process faster on the day of the program. Your ID card is needed  to complete check-in. For group registrations, each participant registered will receive a separate confirmation email to the email id provided for them. General Information : 
  • Attendance for all sessions is required
  • Vegetarian lunch provided on Saturday. Vegetarian breakfast & lunch provided on Sunday
  • Wear loose fitting and comfortable clothing
  • Bring a yoga mat or cloth-mat to sit on
  • You can bring a cushion if needed to sit comfortably on the floor
  • Please allow additional time for traffic delays, find parking and complete check-in formalities before the program begins
Terms & Conditions : 
  • One must attend all sessions. If a portion or any of the sessions is missed, your admission in to the class will be at the discretion of the organizers.
  • I am at least 14 years or above.
Refund/Cancellation Policy: USD 25 processing fee will be deducted for all cancellations on or before 1 week from program date. 50% of the total program fee paid amount will be deducted for cancellation within one week of the program date. 75% of the total  program fee paid amount will be deducted for cancellation from the program date and there after. Our class capacity is limited, thus if a cancellation is necessary, please inform us as early as possible so that we can offer this opportunity to someone on our waiting list. Refund processing time is 3-4 weeks. If you have any questions regarding your registration, feel free to contact us at $center_email or $center_phone Thank you, Inner Engineering Registration Team
